description.value:
You unleash the rot infecting you, spreading the blight to those nearby. All living creatures in a @Template[emanation|distance:60] take @Damage[(floor(@actor.level/2)d6)[void]]{1d6 void} damage for every 2 levels you have, with a @Check[fortitude|against:class-spell|basic] save.

Awakening The blight is infectious. Creatures damaged by your blight take an additional @Damage[1d6[persistent,void]] damage, as they begin to decompose.

Awakening The blight is debilitating. Creatures damaged become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 1} for one round on a success, drained 1 for 1 minute on a failure, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 2} for 1 minute on a critical failure.
